title: Leh Ladakh  e
description: A 16 day bike trip from Delhi to Ladakh region.

title: Its Kasol
description: It was my first trip to Kasol. I heard about it a lot. It was a nice experience.

title: Nandi Hills Bengaluru
description: It was first time I went outside Banglore. Great place to enjoy sunrise, though we were not that lucky.

title: I Amsterdam
description: I went to amsterdam for 2 days. One was kept for Amsterdam Music Festival and other to roam around. And for these 2 days, no one slept for a minute.

title: South France
description: It was 1 month after we landed in France. Heard a lot about south France and especially Monaco (Casinos). We all spent whole night in Casino.

title: Visiting Douai
description: It was first time visiting Douai, since we came here. Its not so big city but a nice place to roam around.

title: Dinner At Professors House
description: We had never net our professor and for the first time he invited us for dinner. Such a great man. We really enjoyed a lot.

title: Paris Barcelona Trip
description: Just been 2 weeks and we decide a 4 day trip of Paris and Barcelona. Barcelona, the cosmopolitan capital of Spain’s Catalonia region, is known for its art and architecture while Paris is known for its cafe culture and designer boutiques along the Rue du Faubourg Saint-Honoré.

title: Belgium Trip 5
description: The only cities we visited were Brussels, Belgium’s capital and home to the European Union headquarters. The Grand-Place square at the heart of the city has shops and cafes inside ornate 17th-century guildhouses, and the intricate Gothic Hôtel de Ville (town hall) with a distinctive bell tower. and Bruges, the capital of West Flanders in…

title: Party In Hostel
description: Not my first get together with everyone but it was first time I hd fun with other exchange students.

title: First Class At College
description: I was really excited about my first lecture at my exchange program.

title: Lunch With Chinise
description: It has been only 2 days and we exchange students decided to cook together. Got a chance to eat some homely cooked Chinese dishes.

title: Lille Trip
description: Lille is the capital of the Hauts-de-France region in northern France, near the border with Belgium.

title: First Day In Douai
description: Douai is a commune in the Nord département in northern France. It is a sub-prefecture of the department. Located on the river Scarpe some 40 kilometres from Lille and 25 km from Arras, Douai is home to one of the region's most impressive belfries.

title: India France  2
description: It was my first time traveling abroad and I will be there for 4 months. Really excited about this chapter of my life.
